frontmatter.title: Cdk For Kubernetes (Cdk8S)
frontmatter.subtitle: Collaborative and visual infrastructure as code for Cdk For Kubernetes (Cdk8S)
frontmatter.howItWorksDetails: cdk8s is an open-source software development framework for defining Kubernetes applications and reusable abstractions using familiar programming languages and rich object-oriented APIs. cdk8s apps synthesize into standard Kubernetes manifests which can be applied to any Kubernetes cluster.
featureList: Defines Kubernetes applications and reusable abstractions using familiar programming languages.
Compose and share reusable components through code libraries.
